ronettes.name: The Ronettes
ronettes.description: Be My Baby. Phil Spector's wall of sound, Ronnie's voice on top.

lesley_gore.name: Lesley Gore
lesley_gore.description: It's My Party. Teen pop with backbone.

albums.title: I'll Cry If I Want To

archies.name: The Archies
archies.description: Sugar Sugar. A cartoon band that outsold the Beatles in 1969.

monkees.name: The Monkees
monkees.description: Manufactured for TV, became real. Hey Hey.

bowie.name: David Bowie
bowie.description: Ziggy Stardust. Chameleon. Alien. The most important artist of the 70s.

t_rex.name: T. Rex
t_rex.description: Marc Bolan. Electric Warrior. Invented glam rock over a weekend.

elton.name: Elton John
elton.description: Tiny Dancer. Rocket Man. Spectacles and sequins over pure songcraft.

depeche.name: Depeche Mode
depeche.description: Basildon boys who made darkness danceable. Never stopped.

new_order.name: New Order
new_order.description: From the ashes of Joy Division. Blue Monday changed everything.

tears.name: Tears for Fears
tears.description: Everybody Wants to Rule the World. Ambition as pop.

mj.name: Michael Jackson
mj.description: The King of Pop. Thriller. Moonwalk. Changed music, dance, video, everything.

madonna.name: Madonna
madonna.description: Material Girl to icon. Reinvented herself every era.

prince.name: Prince
prince.description: Purple Rain. Genius. Played every instrument. Danced harder than anyone.

nsync.name: *NSYNC
nsync.description: Bye Bye Bye. JT origin story. Pop perfection.

backstreet.name: Backstreet Boys
backstreet.description: I Want It That Way. Sold 100 million records.

spice_girls.name: Spice Girls
spice_girls.description: Girl Power. Wannabe. Five personalities, one cultural earthquake.

taylor.name: Taylor Swift
taylor.description: Country kid turned pop titan turned indie. Eras Tour broke records.

billie.name: Billie Eilish
billie.description: Bedroom pop to global domination. Whispered a generation into existence.

weeknd.name: The Weeknd
weeknd.description: Abel Tesfaye. Dark R&B turned stadium pop. Blinding Lights.

elvis.name: Elvis Presley
elvis.description: The King. Took blues and country, made it dangerous, then safe, then strange again.

chuck_berry.name: Chuck Berry
chuck_berry.description: Invented the rock guitar solo. Every riff traces back here.

beatles.name: The Beatles
beatles.description: Liverpool four-piece that rewrote the rules. Again. And again.

the_who.name: The Who
the_who.description: Maximum R&B. Townshend's windmill, Moon's chaos.

hendrix.name: Jimi Hendrix
hendrix.description: Rewired the electric guitar. Seattle via London via another dimension.

doors.name: The Doors
doors.description: Morrison's poetry, Manzarek's keys. LA noir meets Dionysus.

jefferson_airplane.name: Jefferson Airplane
jefferson_airplane.description: San Francisco's flagship. Grace Slick's voice cut through the haze.

beach_boys.name: The Beach Boys
beach_boys.description: California myth-makers. Brian Wilson's genius took them far beyond surfing.

dick_dale.name: Dick Dale
dick_dale.description: King of the Surf Guitar. Misirlou. That reverb.

led_zep.name: Led Zeppelin
led_zep.description: The hammer of the gods. Bonham, Page, Plant, Jones. Heavy.

pink_floyd.name: Pink Floyd
pink_floyd.description: Dark Side. The Wall. Comfortably Numb. Art as stadium rock.

queen.name: Queen
queen.description: Freddie Mercury's range. Brian May's guitar. Bohemian Rhapsody.

fleetwood_pop.name: Fleetwood Mac
fleetwood_pop.description: Reinvented as pop-rock royalty. Rumours: heartbreak as art.

ramones.name: Ramones
ramones.description: Queens. 1-2-3-4! Two-minute songs that launched a thousand bands.

sex_pistols.name: Sex Pistols
sex_pistols.description: Anarchy in the UK. One album. Changed everything.

clash.name: The Clash
clash.description: The only band that matters. Punk plus reggae plus everything.

green_day.name: Green Day
green_day.description: Brought punk to the suburbs. Dookie to American Idiot.

talking_heads.name: Talking Heads
talking_heads.description: David Byrne's big suit. Psycho Killer. Same as it ever was.

the_cure.name: The Cure
the_cure.description: Robert Smith's lipstick and hair. Goth, pop, heartbreak, joy.

joy_division.name: Joy Division
joy_division.description: Ian Curtis. Unknown Pleasures. Atmosphere. Post-punk's beating heart.

nirvana.name: Nirvana
nirvana.description: Nevermind. Kurt Cobain screamed and whispered a generation awake.

pearl_jam.name: Pearl Jam
pearl_jam.description: Eddie Vedder's baritone. Ten. Alive. Still going.

soundgarden.name: Soundgarden
soundgarden.description: Chris Cornell's voice. Black Hole Sun. Heavy, strange, beautiful.

alice.name: Alice in Chains
alice.description: Layne Staley and Jerry Cantrell. Harmonies from the abyss.

oasis.name: Oasis
oasis.description: Gallagher brothers. Wonderwall. Definitely Maybe. Lads.

blur.name: Blur
blur.description: Damon Albarn's art school cool. Parklife to experimental.

radiohead.name: Radiohead
radiohead.description: OK Computer. Kid A. Kept evolving past everyone.

strokes.name: The Strokes
strokes.description: Is This It. NYC garage revival. Made rock cool again in 2001.

arcade_fire.name: Arcade Fire
arcade_fire.description: Montreal collective. Funeral. Arena indie before that was a thing.

white_stripes.name: The White Stripes
white_stripes.description: Jack and Meg. Two people, one guitar, one drum kit. Seven Nation Army.

tame.name: Tame Impala
tame.description: Kevin Parker's one-man psych-pop universe. Currents changed the game.

supremes.name: The Supremes
supremes.description: Diana Ross and Motown's crown jewels. Hit after hit.

temptations.name: The Temptations
temptations.description: My Girl. Five voices, perfect choreography, unstoppable.

stevie_wonder.name: Stevie Wonder
stevie_wonder.description: Little Stevie became a genius. The 70s run is untouchable.

albums.title: Songs in the Key of Life

marvin_gaye.name: Marvin Gaye
marvin_gaye.description: What's Going On. Let's Get It On. Soul with a conscience.

otis.name: Otis Redding
otis.description: Stax's greatest voice. Raw, urgent, gone too soon.

aretha.name: Aretha Franklin
aretha.description: The Queen. Respect. That's it. That's the description.

sam_cooke.name: Sam Cooke
sam_cooke.description: Gospel smoothness turned secular. A Change Is Gonna Come.

james_brown.name: James Brown
james_brown.description: The Godfather. Invented funk. The one.

sly_stone.name: Sly & The Family Stone
sly_stone.description: Integrated band, integrated sound. Everyday People.

parliament.name: Parliament-Funkadelic
parliament.description: George Clinton's mothership. One nation under a groove.

earth_wind.name: Earth, Wind & Fire
earth_wind.description: September. Boogie Wonderland. Joy as a musical philosophy.

albums.title: That's the Way of the World

bee_gees.name: Bee Gees
bee_gees.description: Stayin' Alive. The Gibbs brothers owned Saturday night.

donna_summer.name: Donna Summer
donna_summer.description: Queen of Disco. I Feel Love. Moroder's synths + her voice.

chic.name: Chic
chic.description: Nile Rodgers and Bernard Edwards. Le Freak. Good Times. The groove.

dangelo.name: D'Angelo
dangelo.description: Voodoo. Brown Sugar. Made R&B organic and raw again.

erykah.name: Erykah Badu
erykah.description: Baduizm. High priestess of neo-soul. Analog Girl in a Digital World.

lauryn.name: Lauryn Hill
lauryn.description: Miseducation. One perfect solo album. That's enough.

amy.name: Amy Winehouse
amy.description: Back to Black. Voice from another era trapped in this one.

frank_ocean.name: Frank Ocean
frank_ocean.description: Channel Orange. Blonde. Redefined vulnerability in R&B.

sza.name: SZA
sza.description: Ctrl. SOS. Messy, honest, enormous. Generation-defining.

beyonce.name: Beyonc√©
beyonce.description: Destiny's Child to solo dominance. Lemonade. Renaissance. The standard.

grandmaster.name: Grandmaster Flash
grandmaster.description: The Message. The turntable as instrument. Hip hop's first masterpiece.

run_dmc.name: Run-DMC
run_dmc.description: Walk This Way. Made hip hop rock. Adidas with no laces.

beastie_boys.name: Beastie Boys
beastie_boys.description: Three white kids from NYC. Licensed to Ill to Paul's Boutique genius.

public_enemy.name: Public Enemy
public_enemy.description: Fight the Power. Chuck D's voice, Flavor Flav's clock, Bomb Squad's noise.

albums.title: It Takes a Nation of Millions

nas.name: Nas
nas.description: Illmatic. Queensbridge poet. One perfect album and a career of great ones.

wu_tang.name: Wu-Tang Clan
wu_tang.description: 36 Chambers. Staten Island's finest. Protect Ya Neck.

tribe.name: A Tribe Called Quest
tribe.description: Jazz-rap pioneers. Can I Kick It? Yes you can.

biggie.name: The Notorious B.I.G.
biggie.description: Ready to Die. Brooklyn's finest storyteller. Juicy.

tupac.name: Tupac Shakur
tupac.description: All Eyez on Me. Poet, activist, icon. California Love.

outkast.name: OutKast
outkast.description: Andr√© 3000 and Big Boi. ATLiens. Stankonia. Hey Ya!

ugk.name: UGK
ugk.description: Bun B and Pimp C. Texas trill. International Players Anthem.

three_6.name: Three 6 Mafia
three_6.description: Memphis. Dark, hypnotic, influential. Won an Oscar.

jay_z.name: Jay-Z
jay_z.description: Hov. Reasonable Doubt to Blueprint to empire. Brooklyn's own.

kanye.name: Kanye West
kanye.description: College Dropout. MBDTF. Yeezus. Genius producer turned complicated everything.

eminem.name: Eminem
eminem.description: Slim Shady. Marshall Mathers. Best-selling rapper ever. Detroit.

kendrick.name: Kendrick Lamar
kendrick.description: Good Kid, MAAD City. DAMN. Mr. Morale. Compton's prophet.

drake.name: Drake
drake.description: Started from the bottom. Singing rapper. Dominated streaming.

travis.name: Travis Scott
travis.description: Astroworld. Rage. Houston's psychedelic trap auteur.

tyler.name: Tyler, the Creator
tyler.description: Odd Future to IGOR. Constant evolution.

albums.title: Call Me If You Get Lost

kraftwerk.name: Kraftwerk
kraftwerk.description: Autobahn. Trans-Europe Express. D√ºsseldorf robots who invented the future.

tangerine.name: Tangerine Dream
tangerine.description: Berlin school. Sequencers and cosmic ambience.

frankie.name: Frankie Knuckles
frankie.description: The Godfather of House. Chicago warehouse. Your Love.

daft_punk.name: Daft Punk
daft_punk.description: Around the World. Discovery. Random Access Memories. French robots.

disclosure.name: Disclosure
disclosure.description: UK brothers. Settle. Brought house to the streaming generation.

derrick_may.name: Derrick May
derrick_may.description: Detroit techno originator. Strings of Life. Innovator.

aphex.name: Aphex Twin
aphex.description: Richard D. James. Selected Ambient Works. Windowlicker. Alien genius.

prodigy.name: The Prodigy
prodigy.description: Firestarter. Breathe. Rave music with punk attitude.

chemical.name: The Chemical Brothers
chemical.description: Block Rockin' Beats. Big beat pioneers from Manchester.

skrillex.name: Skrillex
skrillex.description: Scary Monsters. Brought dubstep to the mainstream.

flume.name: Flume
flume.description: Australian future bass. Self-titled debut at 21.

eno.name: Brian Eno
eno.description: Invented ambient music. Music for Airports. Producer to the stars.

boards.name: Boards of Canada
boards.description: Nostalgic electronica. Music Has the Right to Children. Haunted.

albums.title: Music Has the Right to Children

patsy_cline.name: Patsy Cline
patsy_cline.description: Crazy. I Fall to Pieces. Country's greatest voice, gone too soon.

jim_reeves.name: Jim Reeves
jim_reeves.description: Gentleman Jim. Velvet voice, countrypolitan smooth.

johnny_cash.name: Johnny Cash
johnny_cash.description: The Man in Black. Folsom Prison. American legend.

waylon.name: Waylon Jennings
waylon.description: Refused Nashville's polish. Did it his way.

willie.name: Willie Nelson
willie.description: Red Headed Stranger. On the Road Again. Texas icon.

wilco.name: Wilco
wilco.description: Jeff Tweedy. Uncle Tupelo to Yankee Hotel Foxtrot.

ryan_adams.name: Ryan Adams
ryan_adams.description: Heartbreaker. Whiskeytown to prolific solo career.

sturgill.name: Sturgill Simpson
sturgill.description: Metamodern Sounds. Country's psychedelic outlaw for a new era.

tyler_childers.name: Tyler Childers
tyler_childers.description: Purgatory. Kentucky coal country voice. Appalachian new guard.

joan_baez.name: Joan Baez
joan_baez.description: The voice of the movement. Pure, clear, committed.

pete_seeger.name: Pete Seeger
pete_seeger.description: The link to Woody Guthrie. Keeper of the flame.

dylan.name: Bob Dylan
dylan.description: Went electric at Newport. They booed. He didn't care.

byrds.name: The Byrds
byrds.description: Jangle and shimmer. Dylan through a Rickenbacker.

simon_garfunkel.name: Simon & Garfunkel
simon_garfunkel.description: The Sound of Silence. Poetry and harmony from Queens.

joni.name: Joni Mitchell
joni.description: Blue. Court and Spark. Painted in sound. Peerless.

james_taylor.name: James Taylor
james_taylor.description: Fire and Rain. Sweet Baby James. Laurel Canyon warmth.

cat_stevens.name: Cat Stevens
cat_stevens.description: Peace Train. Wild World. Tea for the Tillerman. Then walked away.

nick_drake.name: Nick Drake
nick_drake.description: Pink Moon. Three albums, no fame, then gone. Discovered too late.

bon_iver.name: Bon Iver
bon_iver.description: Justin Vernon in a cabin. For Emma. Skinny Love. Then reinvented everything.

fleet_foxes.name: Fleet Foxes
fleet_foxes.description: Robin Pecknold. Baroque folk harmonies from Seattle. Timeless.

iron_wine.name: Iron & Wine
iron_wine.description: Sam Beam's whisper. The Creek Drank the Cradle. Hushed beauty.

coltrane.name: John Coltrane
coltrane.description: From hard bop through sheets of sound to spiritual transcendence.

miles.name: Miles Davis
miles.description: Cool incarnate. Reinvented jazz every decade.

mingus.name: Charles Mingus
mingus.description: Composer, bandleader, force of nature. The bass as orchestra.

albums.title: The Black Saint and the Sinner Lady

ornette.name: Ornette Coleman
ornette.description: Threw out the rulebook. Free Jazz wasn't a genre, it was a declaration.

albums.title: The Shape of Jazz to Come

sun_ra.name: Sun Ra
sun_ra.description: From Saturn. Arkestra. Space is the place.

albums.title: The Futuristic Sounds of Sun Ra

jobim.name: Antonio Carlos Jobim
jobim.description: The Girl from Ipanema. Brazilian genius who changed jazz.

stan_getz.name: Stan Getz
stan_getz.description: The Sound. Brought bossa nova to America.

herbie.name: Herbie Hancock
herbie.description: Head Hunters. Future Shock. Jazz that bumps.

weather_report.name: Weather Report
weather_report.description: Zawinul and Shorter. Birdland. Jazz fusion's greatest band.

return_forever.name: Return to Forever
return_forever.description: Chick Corea's electric group. Romantic Warrior. Virtuosity.

kamasi.name: Kamasi Washington
kamasi.description: The Epic. Brought jazz back to the conversation. Spiritual.

robert_glasper.name: Robert Glasper
robert_glasper.description: Black Radio. Jazz meets hip hop meets R&B. Genre-fluid.

shabaka.name: Shabaka Hutchings
shabaka.description: Sons of Kemet. The Comet Is Coming. London's jazz renaissance.

muddy.name: Muddy Waters
muddy.description: Electrified the Delta. Every British kid wanted to be him.

bb_king.name: B.B. King
bb_king.description: Lucille. The thrill is gone. King of the Blues.

mayall.name: John Mayall
mayall.description: The schoolmaster. Clapton, Peter Green, Mick Taylor all came through.

fleetwood.name: Fleetwood Mac
fleetwood.description: Before Rumours, they were a blues band. Peter Green's otherworldly tone.

cream.name: Cream
cream.description: Clapton, Baker, Bruce. Power trio. Crossroads. Sunshine of Your Love.

allman.name: Allman Brothers Band
allman.description: Duane and Gregg. At Fillmore East. Southern blues rock perfection.

zz_top.name: ZZ Top
zz_top.description: Texas boogie. La Grange. Sharp Dressed Man. Those beards.

srv.name: Stevie Ray Vaughan
srv.description: Texas Flood. Last great blues guitar hero. Breathtaking.
